description: Surrogate unique identifier for this vehicle type and weight classification record; used as the primary key and to reference the classification elsewhere.
Date-time when the record was created or last updated, stored as yyyymmddhhmmssSSS; supports auditing, sequencing, and change tracking.

Human-readable category describing vehicle type and gross vehicle weight rating (GVWR) class, including attributes like drivetrain or size; used to classify fleet assets for reporting, procurement, and compliance.
Identifier for the equivalent classification in a legacy source system to support mapping and migration; likely nullable; confirm with SME.
Name of the table in the legacy system where the equivalent classification originated; used for lineage and traceability; likely nullable; confirm with SME.
